name: I like soup
description:
"I'm making a film about a man eating soup..." Cuprus Cu

A simple, relaxing game about soup. A plain and hearty soup is made of fresh ingredients. Your task is to pick up right ingredients.

a - tin to the left

d - tin to the right

m - music on/off 

Music: JASON SHAW    Happy Ukulele   https://audionautix.com/ 

What is your score? Write down in the comments below.
